snippet: A former president’s contributions are in the spotlight as the current president tries to make his mark.
abstract: Trip by former president George W Bush to Africa coincides with that of Pres Obama, throwing spotlight on Bush's legacy there; while Bush is remembered at home for war, terrorism and national security, in Africa he is seen as lifesaver who helped arrest a deadly epidemic and promoted development of impoverished lands.
lead_paragraph: A former president’s contributions are in the spotlight as the current president tries to make his mark.

headline.main: Bush a Fond Presence in Africa for Work During and Since His Presidency
headline.print_headline: Bush a Fond Presence in Africa for Work During and Since His Presidency

keywords.value: President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief
keywords.name: organizations
